channel.title: Need help! rep++
channel.description:
[center]I purchased a VPS from: VPSDEPOT.com
I uploaded all of my server files, but now I don't know how to run the run.bat file making it so other can play my server!
If someone can help, that'd be great.
I [b]will [/b]use teamviewer if that is easier for you.[/center]

item.title: Need help! rep++
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It really depends on what platform your vps is running. Chances are it’s probably not windows, in which case you’ll need to use bash and ssh to start the server, seeing as linux doesn’t use the command prompt. If it is windows, then you can use RDP to connect and start run.bat normally. This is a vague answer, but your question is rather vague too. You should consider elaborating a bit.

Also, this question is obviously geared toward private servers, so I’m going to lock it rather than move it. Consider reposting it on moparisthebest.com/smf if you want more help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! rep++
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

In this community, Rep is not a factor. Asking for Rep is also prohibited.
Other than that, I have no answer to your question.

Read full topic
